pages.text: List of commonly used commands: $(br)$(l)Spawn$()$(li)$(c:/spawn tp)/spawn tp$(/c)$(li)$(c:/spawn set)/spawn set$(/c) $(4)$(l)*$()$(br)$(l)Teleport requests$()$(li)/tpa <target-player>$(li)/tpahere <target-player>$(li)/tpaccept <target-player>$(li)/tpdeny <target-player>$()$(br)$(l)Player Homes$()$(li)/home set <home-name>$(li)/home tp <home-name>$(li)/home delete <home-name>$()

$(br)$(l)Warps$$(4)$(l) *$()$(li)/warp set <warp-name>$(li)/warp tp <warp-name>$(li)/warp delete <warp-name>$()$(br)$(l)Back$()$(li)$(c:/back)/back$(/c)$(br)$(l)Nickname$()/nickname set <nickname>/nickname clear/nickname reveal <nickname>$()$(br)$(l)Random Teleport$()$(li)$(c:/randomteleport)/randomteleport$(/c)$(li)$(c:/rtp)/rtp$(/c)$()$(br)$(4)$(l)*$()Must be in single player with cheats enabled or if on a server, then have admin privs.

$(br)$(l)Kitchen sink$() *$()$(li)/fly <target-player>$(4)$(l) *$()$(li)/workbench$(li)/enderchest$()$(br)$(l)Config$()$(li)/essentialcommands config reload$()$(br2)$(4)$(l)*$() Must be in single player with cheats enabled or if on a server, then have admin privs.
$(li)Names in brackets '[name]' are optional. Names in '<name>' are required. Do not use quotes ', brackets '[]' or '<>' in commands.
